its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the compan y, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., probably its fiercest rival.

Felt Compelled To Quit' Orange News David Cameron has confirmed his communications chief Andy Coulson felt compelled to resign because of`` pressures on him and his family''. Mr Andy Coulson , a former editor of the World, said continued coverage of events connected to my old job made it difficult David Cameron 's spin chief Andy Coulson quits today, saying the continuing row over phone-hacking when he was editor of the World was distracting from his job. Tory said.`` The cloud had obviously become a lot bigger in recent weeks.'' One minister did, however, voice doubts about Andy Coulson 's claim that media intrusion alone had prompted his resignation. This resignation must mean that Andy Coulson knows something is coming down the pipeline, the minister said. Labour claimed the decision to appoint Andy Coulson to such a senior Downing Street post raised questions about David Cameron 's judgment.
